Functions & Usability

After conducting a thorough analysis of user experience in other apps and services, we were able to find the perfect formula for our interface. We found the golden mean where design can impress and delight the eye, while also being user-friendly and easy to use.

Dubai's Challenges and Solutions

A difficult adjustment to holidaying in Dubai

The social environment seems unfriendly and overloaded with irrelevant offers. Instead of experiencing positive emotions, a person gets stuck in problems of search, socialization and everyday life, instead of resting or pursuing their goals.

Stagnation of the entertainment market

Small companies, being overshadowed by big brands, go unnoticed by their customers. Similarly, consumers with modest income levels do not find suitable offers. The quality of the market suffers from significant competitive inequality and lack of choices in the information field.

Hidden threat to society

WHO experts predict that depression will become a key cause of disability, ranking second after cardiovascular pathology. The problem of loneliness is relevant worldwide, for example, according to the ONS, 29% of Britons spend their leisure time alone.

Large quantity does not mean quality

A large number of places and events does not mean the quality of each of them.
According to DET, only 3 % of restaurants meet high quality standards. The same can be assumed for other types of places or leisure activities. There may be enough human traffic for everyone, but it does not mean that people will be satisfied.

Healthy competition

Healthy competition - collective progress

Shuffle brings a breath of fresh air to small companies, promoting their development and market presence.

By stimulating traffic and moderating establishments and events, it will increase demand and most importantly, the reach of visits, encourage the growth in the level and quality of offerings.

Get the most out of leisure and business events

Get the most out of leisure and business events

Shuffle is a smart pocket guide that doesn't burden the user, but thinks for them. Sequentially providing a narrow selection of places, events, activities based on: location; mood; interests; weather conditions; budget level, and many other unique features

Friends and networking everywhere

Friends and networking everywhere

Shuffle doesn't provoke depression, but breaks it down by considering your emotions. Finding company with similar interests for a specific event or place is not a problem. Finding business events, partners, or communities - however you want

Volume and quality

Attracting large international traffic; strengthening user interaction through various social solutions; a strict and fair system of content moderation, rules that allow everyone to have equal rights, user feedback that is not influenced by commerce; all this creates an infrastructure in which it is interesting to exist and one must strive to ensure quality in order to be in. This approach will distribute traffic to all the quality content that the Emirate provides and will provoke the services quality increase.

Shuffle as the city's control panel

Not only observe, but can control

Different types of traffic on the map. Determine low traffic and improve it. Determine low quality of entire regions dynamics and improve it

Detailed activity statistics, of offers conversion percentage and attractiveness of each region

Phenomenal psychological profiles users statistics and types of content of the entire Emirate

You know exactly the general social statistics. Do you know the exact statistics of the people, form leisure consumption and create the dynamics of the entire Emirate on the international stage? We know
